top_comments.comment: Why isn't human overpopulation ever discussed relative to global warming?  Seven billion people emitting loads of carbon is worse than 5 billion people emitting carbon.  There is no historical precedent for the number of humans but it's rarely discussed  as a contributor to our ills.

comments_since_last_sample.body: One of the prophecies in the bible is the ruining of the earth in the last days, as well as critical times hard to deal with. We can all see these politicians cant save us they are only human like us they have limitations. Gods Kingdom is our only hope for the earth
Its just 3 degrees, I dunno what the big deal is all about!
Give that presenter some hair dye.  He looks ludicrous.

It’s scary.

May Allah save all humanity and make us grateful to him.
The problem is in America we need statistics in Fahrenheit. That's 5.4 degrees fahrenheit  change. Absolutely scary in these units.
Humans have this ,IT wouldn't happen to me attitude.Just like death is for sure but most of us live life as if we gonna live forever.
I dont believe a word of it
Fear mongering at its best, I live in the north bring it on,

Everyone’s going to hate 😡me for saying this but all I keep hearing is carbon 🪨 this carbon that but no one seeing the big picture human 🧑🏽👨🏿👩🏻‍🦱👶👱‍♀️👵🏾 population growth, 8 billion people as of today November 1, 2021 what’s going to happen by 2030, 9 billion maybe even 10 billion every one of those people need resources from water💦 food 🍣🥧🍖fuel ⛽️ housing 🏠and everything in between. Why isn't human overpopulation ever discussed relative to global warming?  Seven billion people emitting loads of carbon is worse than 5 billion people emitting carbon.  There is no historical precedent for the number of humans but it's rarely discussed  as a contributor to our ills.
Meanwhile over 50 volcanos erupting. Please don't blame us. Earth Cycle, it's a cycle of cataclysms. The Economist is Rothschild funded, we know the agenda.

I do not believe in man made global warming.
